item.title:
RT by @fede_intern: SPECIAL: Justin Drake & Federico Carrone on Ethereum’s Native Rollup Roadmap
Native rollups are becoming widely accepted.
For today's episode, @Robbie_rollup and @ayyyeandy sat down with @drakefjustin and @fede_intern to discuss:
> Native Rollups vs. Based Rollups > ETH Value Accrual From L2s > Ethereum’s Core Services > The Real Bottleneck for Ethereum Scaling > Which Rollups Will Pivot First
Full episode links below.
Timestamps: 00:00 Intro 02:30 Based & Native Rollups Overview 14:10 Implementation Challenges 20:40 Returning Value to ETH 31:51 Ethereum Scalability 42:38 L2 Incentive Alignment 52:13 Interop & Composability 1:05:46 Technical Functions Of L2s
item.dc:creator: @therollupco
item.description:
SPECIAL: Justin Drake & Federico Carrone on Ethereum’s Native Rollup Roadmap

Native rollups are becoming widely accepted.

For today's episode, @Robbie_rollup and @ayyyeandy sat down with @drakefjustin and @fede_intern to discuss:

> Native Rollups vs. Based Rollups
> ETH Value Accrual From L2s
> Ethereum’s Core Services
> The Real Bottleneck for Ethereum Scaling
> Which Rollups Will Pivot First

Full episode links below.

Timestamps:
00:00 Intro
02:30 Based & Native Rollups Overview
14:10 Implementation Challenges
20:40 Returning Value to ETH
31:51 Ethereum Scalability
42:38 L2 Incentive Alignment
52:13 Interop & Composability
1:05:46 Technical Functions Of L2s

item.title: Paris is my favorite city in the world with Buenos Aires, Singapore and Tokyo. New York and San Francisco are also cool but I’ve not been there in ages.
item.dc:creator: @fede_intern
item.description: Paris is my favorite city in the world with Buenos Aires, Singapore and Tokyo. New York and San Francisco are also cool but I’ve not been there in ages.

item.title:
Ethereum can’t stop because of anybody bags. If your company raised money for building an RFC it’s not Ethereum fault. If you’re a smart founder you should be able to change course and still provide value to your clients and partners.
Scale the L1. Bring interops with based rollups. Remove multisigs with native. Let’s get preconfirmations and better wallet integration with interop to improve UI/UX. Add RISC-V.
item.dc:creator: @fede_intern
item.description:
Ethereum can’t stop because of anybody bags. If your company raised money for building an RFC it’s not Ethereum fault. If you’re a smart founder you should be able to change course and still provide value to your clients and partners.

Scale the L1.
Bring interops with based rollups.
Remove multisigs with native.
Let’s get preconfirmations and better wallet integration with interop to improve UI/UX.
Add RISC-V.

item.title: Never kick a man when he is in the floor. It can backfire and they can hit you too. We all go down at some point.
item.dc:creator: @fede_intern
item.description: Never kick a man when he is in the floor. It can backfire and they can hit you too. We all go down at some point.

item.title:
Good. Solana is a serious tech project with good companies on top. It also puts a check and balance in Ethereum: it’s good for Ethereum to have a real competitor.
It’s attracting too much crime but so did Ethereum at one point. I think the leaders of Solana should be a little bit harsher with the grifters but they are not responsible of what’s happening.
item.dc:creator: @fede_intern
item.description:
Good. Solana is a serious tech project with good companies on top. It also puts a check and balance in Ethereum: it’s good for Ethereum to have a real competitor.

It’s attracting too much crime but so did Ethereum at one point. I think the leaders of Solana should be a little bit harsher with the grifters but they are not responsible of what’s happening.

item.title: RT by @fede_intern: 1. You’re mixing DeFi summer with Luna 2. Memecoins don’t have financial contagion with other assets. They can be even worse: mixing famous people with short term financial gains is a public disaster for crypto. We just got a president of a G20 country being scammed or being part of a scam (I don’t know what is worst) with people from your ecosystem. Minimizing what happened doesn’t help anybody.
item.dc:creator: @fede_intern
item.description:
1. You’re mixing DeFi summer with Luna
2. Memecoins don’t have financial contagion with other assets. They can be even worse: mixing famous people with short term financial gains is a public disaster for crypto. We just got a president of a G20 country being scammed or being part of a scam (I don’t know what is worst) with people from your ecosystem. Minimizing what happened doesn’t help anybody.

item.title: 1. native based rollups will solve this 2. they will have better performance than solana 3. they can great interop between l2s. no chain will be able to handle the load that is coming.
item.dc:creator: @fede_intern
item.description:
1. native based rollups will solve this
2. they will have better performance than solana
3. they can great interop between l2s. no chain will be able to handle the load that is coming.

item.title:
If I have learnt something in life is that: - crises appear when you never expect them - never believe you have won, even when you’re winning
only the paranoids survive.
item.dc:creator: @fede_intern
item.description:

- crises appear when you never expect them
- never believe you have won, even when you’re winning

only the paranoids survive.

item.title:
Toly, people from your ecosystem with the president of a G20 country have made crypto look like a big nigerian prince email scam.
The contagion is not in the financial layer but in the social layer. You guys are not responsible for what happened but the worst thing you can do is say this is not as bad as something else during a crisis.
item.dc:creator: @fede_intern
item.description:
Toly, people from your ecosystem with the president of a G20 country have made crypto look like a big nigerian prince email scam.

The contagion is not in the financial layer but in the social layer. You guys are not responsible for what happened but the worst thing you can do is say this is not as bad as something else during a crisis.
